name: 41 Hours
summary: 41 Hours is a first-person shooter dramatic game that follows the narrative of Ethan, a workaholic scientist in search of his long-lost wife. The story is intriguing and it takes several surprising turns as it develops over 11 Chapters and 20 hours of gameplay.

Love mysterious games? How about adventure and a bit of thriller and action? We have the right game for you. 41148 is a combination of all these genres in one.
Help Sina, the main character of the story, to remember his identity. In this journey, you will face horrible events, characters and places. So, be smart to solve the problems and be brave to reveal the mysteries.

4185113 centers around a nameless, featureless protagonist exploring a mysterious sidescrolling world and learning about their past. Various items can be found throughout the game, along with multiple televisions to activate.

name: 41 Days: Minimalist Pandemic Simulator
summary: Minimalist real-time strategy. Place quarantine lines to stop the virus from spreading.

name: 4.1.60Co
summary: Cobalt 60 of April 1 is a magical text-based adventure game in which players play Anton Andreevich Sidorov, the protagonist of the Soviet Union in the 1960s. - My name is Anton, the name of the man who helped me is Anton, and the name of the man who tried to kill me is Anton, so who am I?

4=10 is a casual number puzzle game for both young and old.
The goal is to create an expression with 4 given numbers equal to 10. For example 1+2+3+4=10
The game uses only basic math and starts off easy, gradually becoming more difficult. Hopefully players should also become better at it.
